#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Understand Your Importance in Life
#Text=In such a confusing , ambiguous society sometimes you never really know what it 's all about .
#Text=Often times people will feel like no one needs them in this world .
#Text=As much as it can sometimes seem as though the sun is always setting , somewhere on the globe it is also always rising .
#Text=The beauty of your life is that you can change it all , it all starts with what you want to see .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Always have a reason to live for .
#Text=Think about all the life on Earth .
#Text=How in the great wide galaxy did something like this come to happen ?
#Text=No matter if you believe in the Big Man in White , Jesus , or even Extraterrestrial Pancakes there is something special here .
#Text=Maybe you should see it all , or maybe you should help someone else see what you do .
#Text=It 's all in your perspective !
#Text=Those who fear change wo n't .
#Text=So Do n't !
#Text=If you do n't feel important or you feel inadequate , then you must make a change to live differently .
#Text=Maybe you should just try something new , call up some old acquaintances , make some friends , or even start a garage band .
#Text=Branch out and try something that is n't just based on your own efforts .
#Text=Friends can always have an impact on each other .
#Text=Teamwork ! You 're not alone .
#Text=You have something that you can give that can change someones life .
#Text=Sometimes our time is the most valuable thing we can give to each other .
#Text=Join a religion .
#Text=Many people find purpose by believing in a higher power .
#Text=Religion is a great way to change your perspective and even if you do n't believe you can always meet some new people .
#Text=Find yourself !
#Text=Certainly if you had a map you could circle where you 're standing , but maybe you should look for something that drives you .
#Text=You Do n't Have to Change the World .
#Text=We do n't live in a fly or die society .
#Text=There is plenty of room to sight see and blaze a different trail .
#Text=The most important person to be important to is yourself .
#Text=Many people have done selfless deeds , and did n't even notice .
#Text=But little do they know , the receiver of your kind actions is probably very thankful .
#Text=Like if you offered your unfinished bagel to someone in a restaurant , and paid no mind to it .
#Text=They could have been having financial difficulties , and were n't able to afford food the day of their job application .
#Text=Your kindness could have put them in a good mood , and allowed them to get the job .
#Text=But if you were n't alive , they probably would 've failed to get the job , and would still be in difficult times now .
#Text=You perform countless kind actions everyday without even knowing , and your actions greatly impact others .
#Text=Understand the impact you 've made on the world .
#Text=In your mind , you may be just another face in the crowd .
#Text=Another pair of hands , another imperfect human .
#Text=But this is wrong .
#Text=Your attitude defines everything about you , and all attitudes are contagious .
#Text=Consider changing attitudes if yours is n't where it should be .
#Text=Have a good attitude .
#Text=If you simply smile to everyone you see , they are much more likely to have a good day , and so are you .
#Text=The simple act of smiling makes you happy , and your mood will spread to others .
#Text=Do n't spread your bad attitudes .
#Text=When you 're having a bad day , and just ca n't seem to snap out of your funk , do n't let others know .
#Text=Try your hardest to show others a smile throughout your day .
#Text=This will make them happier , and after smiling to so many people , you 'll probably be happy too .
#Text=If you frown at everyone you see , your vibe will rub off on them , and they 'll all have bad days too .
#Text=Know what you are capable of .
#Text=Understand that if you really try , you can accomplish anything you 'd like to do .
#Text=If you truly believe in something enough , and continually make an effort to stand up for your beliefs , you will make a difference in the world .
#Text=Almost all famous people you 've heard of have made huge differences in the world , most for the better .
#Text=And many people you have n't heard of have made differences that affect your life to this day .
#Text=Such as Rosalind Franklin .
#Text=If it were n't for this unknown woman , we would n't know what DNA looks like .
#Text=If she decided that she did n't make a difference in the world , we still probably would n't know .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Always make an effort to help those in need .
#Text=Everyone is on this Earth for a reason .
#Text=You 're here , are n't you ?
#Text=Understand who you are before trying to understand your importance in life .
#Text=Respect and explore religions .

#Text=Humans who believe in a higher power , whether through Christianity , Buddhism , Judaism , Islam , or just spirituality , share a sense of their own place and importance in the world and a sense of inner peace and strength , no matter how they relate to their God .
#Text=Consider finding a religion to believe in .
#Text=This will help you understand your purpose in life .
#Text=Gain perspective .
#Text=Volunteer , even if just for an hour or two , at a soup kitchen , free clinic , homeless shelter , etc.
#Text=Such life experiences are truly a " win-win .

#Text= Not only do you help other people , you will likely have a greater appreciation for your own circumstances and opportunities .
